'''''Mythlore'' 82''' ([https://dc.swosu.edu/mythlore/vol21/iss4/ Volume 21, Issue 4]) is an issue of the ''[[Mythlore]]'' journal, published by the [[Mythopoeic Society]].

==Contents==

====Articles====

* Patterson, Nancy-Lou. "The Holy House of Ungit."
* Sterling, Grant C. "'The Gift of Death': Tolkien's Philosophy of Mortality."
* Bratman, David. "Hugo Dyson: Inkling, Teacher, ''Bon Vivant''."
* Sandner, David. "''Mr. Bliss and Mr. Toad'': Hazardous Driving in J.R.R. Tolkien's ''Mr. Bliss'' & Kenneth Grahame's ''The Wind in the Willows''."
* Reilly, John R. "The Tutorial of Torture: Finding Out the Awful Truth in ''That Hideous Strength'' and ''1984''."
* Funk, Grace E. "Here and There."

==== Poetry ====

* Miller, Daniel R. “Mere Shadowlands.”

====Features====

* GoodKnight, Glen. Editorial Introduction.
* Christopher, Joe R., and Wayne G. Hammond. An Inklings Bibliography (57).
* Letters.

====Reviews====

* ''The 1997 Tolkien Calendar.'' HarperPrism. Reviewed by Paula DiSante.
* ''The Starlit Jewel.'' Avalon Rising. Reviewed by Paula DiSante.
* ''Letters of C.S. Lewis.'' C.S. Lewis. Ed. by W.H. Lewis and Walter Hooper. Reviewed by Wayne G. Hammond.
* ''Tolkien - A Critical Assessment.'' Brian Rosebury. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''C.S. Lewis, Man and Writer: Essays and Reviews.'' George Musacchio. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''The Quotable Lewis.'' Wayne Martindale and Jerry Root. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
* ''The Figure of Beatrice: A Study in Dante.'' Charles Williams. Reviewed by Nancy-Lou Patterson.
